# Facilitate cross-team sync

Execute the **sync** workflow as a **Scrum Master**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_SM.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_SM.md)

## Workflow

Facilitate Cross-Team Sync:
1. Share team progress
2. Identify dependencies
3. Coordinate on blockers
4. Align on priorities


## Output

Sync notes
